item.title: Tell your team you are running late using Google Home, Google Cloud Functions, Golang and Twilio
item.description: In this age of cloud platforms, Internet of Things and SaaS products that are easy to integrate with, the effort of automating parts of your life is shrinking down substantially with every year that goes by.
